document.full_text: the san antonio spurs took another step toward securing home-court advantage throughout the nba postseason with a 111-102 win over the utah jazz on saturday.
document.title: spurs in tune with 111-102 win over jazz
lines_and_colors: the san antonio spurs took another step toward securing home-court advantage throughout the nba postseason with a 111-102 win over the utah jazz on saturday.
